Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஐயுணர்வு எய்தியக் கண்ணும் பயமின்றேமெய்யுணர்வு இல்லா தவர்க்கு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Even those who have all the knowledge which can be attained by the five senses, will derive no benefit from it, if they are without a knowledge of the true nature of things.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown who has perfected the knowledge of their five senses ('ஐயுணர்வு எய்திய'). This is visualized as them having five, perfectly functioning, crystal-clear eyes and ears, etc., that perceive the world with incredible detail.
Layered_Composition.Midground: They are looking at the universe. They can see all the details of the physical world, but they lack the 'knowledge of the True Thing' ('மெய்யுணர்வு').
Layered_Composition.Background: Because they lack this one, central understanding, all the perfect data from their five senses is shown to be meaningless. It is a chaotic jumble of information with no underlying pattern or meaning. There is 'no benefit' ('பயன் இன்றே'). The perfect sensory data leads to no wisdom or peace.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even a perfect mastery of all five senses is completely useless if one lacks the central, unifying knowledge of the Truth.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The perfect five senses collecting a flood of data is contrasted with the chaotic, meaningless result in the person's mind. The absence of 'Meyyunarvu' is a missing key that would make sense of all the information.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Useless perfection, information overload, meaningless data, cautionary.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A chaotic, flickering, multi-colored light from all the sensory data floods the scene. However, the person's expression is one of confusion and being overwhelmed, not enlightenment.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A surreal shot that shows the flood of perfect sensory data pouring into the person, but resulting in chaos and confusion in their mind.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with complex data visualization and abstract effects.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Sci-fi art, with a philosophical theme.
